skins.shipDescription: Tosa-class battleship number one C Tosa.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Tosa, the first Tosa-class battleship. My construction began long ago, but its completion never came... I have been an aircraft carrier, a battleship, a weapons testbed, and a target; they worked and reworked me to the bone. But now I am here, in this form, and I will not disappoint you.
skins.acquisition: I am the nameship of the Tosa-class battleships, Tosa. I only serve those who I deem worthy. As for you... Well, I do not believe in making hasty judgments. For the time being, let me first assess your abilities.
skins.login: Give me an engaging task, should you find one, Commander.
skins.details: I hate the phrase, "it's how it's always been done." The same mistakes will forever be repeated as long as fools keep spouting it.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Brute force C the most primitive, but also most effective approach. That said, I much prefer fighting with words over swords.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I do not shy away from using any trick required to achieve my goals. I would rather that than play by the rules and end up at the bottom of the sea.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Stay behind if you cannot fight. The weak should know their place from the strong C this is the belief my sister holds.
skins.secretaryIdle4: I am neither as forward-thinking as Amagi, nor as short-fused as my sister. What? What's incorrect? The part about my sister, or my description of myself?
skins.secretaryTouch: Seeing as you have time to kill, why not practice your swordplay with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Acting on a momentary impulse can have deadly repercussions. I do hope you're not getting any outlandish ideas.

skins.shipDescription: An inspection? ...You're awfully gung-ho about your work considering how hot it is outside... Surely you wouldn't have some sort of ulterior motive?
skins.acquisition: An inspection? ...You're awfully gung-ho about your work considering how hot it is outside... Surely you wouldn't have some sort of ulterior motive?
skins.login: Whew... It's nice to get to play freely, but I must take heed of all the extra attention this swimsuit draws to me...
skins.details: You should avoid swimming too much as you're so sickly, Amagi. How tragic it is, a ship such as you being so frail...
skins.secretaryIdle1: The shrine maiden and her sister, frolicking in the water... A rare sight to be had.
skins.secretaryIdle2: We could play a round of go if you are bored. I want a new opponent after playing against only my sister for so long.
skins.secretaryIdle3: You're in need of a snack? Sorry, I only just got these from my sister. That said... we could exchange side dishes, I suppose...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Try this with my sister instead. Actually, don't; it would likely backfire on you...
